channel.title: 2 questions - [508]
channel.description:
Ok well hopefully these will be my last 2 questions cuz ive made like 2-3 others i believe today, but anyways, 1st question.
In my server when a player dies they lose nothing unless a player kills them. I want to make it where they keep the 3 most valuable items they have(it would judge from items.cfg i guess.
How could I do this?
And another question. I like to keep alot of items, about 110, in my bank and have 2147m(2b147m) of each item. However in this source I'm using only about 20 of the items show up, like i'll add all 100 log out, edit it in the source file thingy where there will be max of each, but theres only 20/100 items in the bank, the rest just magically disappear. How can I make it where this won't happen, if theres a way. PS i think its only if u have large amounts of each item idk=\

item.title: 2 questions - [508]
